name: Harbinger and Egress
description:
Harbinger and Egress, lost in a maze, may never see each other - but couldn't do it alone. 

Players switch between two characters, Harbinger and Egress, so unlock doors to escape the maze.

Controls: 

  • WASD - Movement
  • RMB - Switch Characters
  • E to Activate 
  • Esc - Exit game
  • R - Restart level

Designed and Developed by me, Heather Byrom.

This was my first game jam!
